entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:11 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 mm except 30 mm near Port Alice. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. High 8. Forecast issued 5:11 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
